937400.name: Skater Cally - OST
937400.description:
This DLC is the Soundtrack for Skater Cally, Including 42 Tracks. The Songs come in 320Kbps MP3 Files and can be found in the Install Folder.



Tracklist:
1 - Kickflip
2 - Heelflip
3 - Impossible
4 - Shoveit
5 - Varial
6 - 360 Flip
7 - Kickflip to Indy
8 - Hardflip
9 - Manual
10 - Nose Manual
11 - Method
12 - Nosegrab
13 - Tailgrab
14 - Japan Air
15 - Rocket Air
16 - Stalefish
17 - Benihana
18 - Madonna
19 - Frontslide
20 - Backslide
21 - Crooked
22 - 50-50
23 - Smith
24 - 5-0
25 - Feeble
26 - Darkslide
27 - Laserflip
28 - Overcrook
29 - Frontflip
30 - Backside 720
31 - Backflip
32 - Frontside 720
33 - Kickflip McTwist
34 - Triple Kickflip
35 - Hardflip Lateflip

42 - Fakie
